subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons signed wide receiver Noriaki Kinoshita, a native of Osaka, Japan, who played the past three years with the Amsterdam Admirals of N.F.L. Europa. Kinoshita, who is 5 feet 10 inches and 179 pounds, ranked fourth in the league in kickoff returns and added 21 catches for 308 yards and 2 touchdowns. Kinoshita is the second player from Japan to sign with the Falcons. The first, tight end Nachi Abe, lasted 10 days in the 2000 preseason.
